p: SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV belong to the same Betacoronavirus genus, and they share about 80% nucleotide identity. However, despite the close relation between SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2, the latter seems to cause milder infections[ 7]. Moreover, SARS and MERS were characterized mainly with nosocomial spread, whereas SARS-CoV-2 has community transmission[ 12].
